official_title: A bill to amend title 14 of the United States Code to allow the Secretary of the respective department in which the Coast Guard is operating to lease housing facilities for assignment to military personnel on sea duty.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to lease housing for military personnel on sea duty.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 14 of the United States Code to allow the Secretary of the respective department in which the Coast Guard is operating to lease housing facilities for assignment to military personnel on sea duty.
